title: Online doc shows wrong prefix for Zip Package in resource tree
description:
1.  Browse to product documentation (http://docs.marklogic.com/)
2.  Select Xquery/XSLT tab (default)
3.  Toggle to "by category" view
4.  Look at the resource tree under XQuery Library Modules

The last entry is:  ZIP Package (ooxml:)

I think it's supposed to be: ZIP Package (zip:)

changeHistory.comment: The ooxml namespace prefix is correct.  For whatever reason, that module uses the same namespace as the word-processing-ml.xqy.  If memory serves, it is because the purpose of these functions was to extract office zip files.  It just so happens that the same thing works for generic zip files.  Our doc (evanapp) has a 1-1 mapping between namespaces and prefixes.  There is some logic to this, although it is certainly arguable.  But I propose that we leave this as is (it has been this way since the beginning of time).  Colleen, if you disagree, reopen and let me know the reasoning.
Oh, I see, I was hasty and didn't dig down to see that it wasn't the zip:* function.  Apologies.
